content: अभिसारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Going to meet, visiting; attacking, rushing out, going forth; युद्धभिसारिणः <ls>U. 5.</ls> --णी {@--1@} = अभिसारिका see above. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a species of the त्रिष्टुभ् metre in which the Pādas contain 12 instead of 11 syllables, and which is therefore said to approach (अभिसरति) another metre called जगती.
